workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.059149026079214906 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.3939532893496013 --weight-decay 0.00022059746165151574 --lr 0.00043218889809635685 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 61612 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 2.1584939155250284e-05 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
